Table of Contents

Interface ITagRepository

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Interfaces.Repositories
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Repository interface for Tag entity operations. Provides specialized methods for tag management, discovery, usage tracking, and article association beyond basic CRUD.

public interface ITagRepository : IRepository<Tag>
Inherited Members
IRepository<Tag>.GetAllAsync(CancellationToken)
IRepository<Tag>.GetByIdAsync(int, CancellationToken)

IRepository<Tag>.CountWhereAsync(Expression<Func<Tag, bool>>, CancellationToken)

IRepository<Tag>.DeleteByIdAsync(int, CancellationToken)

IRepository<Tag>.InsertAllAsync(IEnumerable<Tag>, CancellationToken)
IRepository<Tag>.UpdateAllAsync(IEnumerable<Tag>, CancellationToken)
IRepository<Tag>.DeleteAllAsync(CancellationToken)

Remarks

This interface defines the contract for persistence operations on tags in the RSS reader application. It supports tag discovery (search, popular, pinned, visible), usage statistics (count, last used), article-tagging relationships, and color-based filtering.

Implementations must ensure: - Case-insensitive name lookups and uniqueness checks. - Efficient queries on frequently accessed fields (Name, UsageCount, LastUsedAt, Color). - Safe handling of tag-article many-to-many relationships (via ArticleTag join entity). - Avoidance of full table scans in production scenarios.

Checks if a tag with the given name already exists in the database.

Parameters

The name of the tag to check.

Cancellation token.

Returns

Task<bool>

true if a tag with this name exists; otherwise false.
